* Experiments with modbus for De Dietreich - Diematic 3 Elitec

Beware that Diematic 3 is not a true Modbus protocol

ourput of read:

```
$ ./read.py
read:
----------- quiet period...

request entries for client 10
read: 
read: 1f030065000197ab00
read: 20030065000192a400
read: 210300650001937500
read: 220300650001934600
read: 230300650001929700
read: 240300650001932000
read: 25030065000192f100
read: 26030065000192c200
read: 270300650001931300
read: 14030065000196d000
read: 150300650001970100
read: 160300650001973200
read: 17030065000196e300
read: 180300650001961c00
read: 19030065000197cd00
read: 1a030065000197fe00
read: 1b0300650001962f00
read: 1c0300650001979800
----------- new cycle...

read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
read: 0b1001b40001020000d38400
----------- quiet period...
```

See also: 
- https://github.com/gmasse/diematic
- https://github.com/Benoit3/Diematic

For mbpool tool, please use: 
- https://github.com/epsilonrt/mbpoll.git
